key_risks: Intense competition from established players and emerging startups
Customer concentration with significant revenue from a limited number of large enterprise clients
Economic sensitivity to macroeconomic downturns impacting IT spending
Pricing pressure limiting adoption among small and medium-sized businesses
Regulatory risks from changes in data privacy laws requiring costly adjustments
controversies: Legal dispute with former employee Gregory Jarvis raising questions about internal governance and employee relations
social_issues: Mixed employee experiences, particularly in sales roles due to high product costs and limited market appeal
governance_issues: Questions about internal governance and employee relations due to legal dispute with former employee
